title: [BUG] SKBitmap.Decode(codec)  return  null
body:
**Description**

SKCodec codec = SKCodec.Create(@"C:\Users\jxw\Desktop\png\1.png");
SKBitmap sKBitmap = SKBitmap.Decode(codec);

sKBitmap 的值等于null


System.Drawing
Bitmap bitmap = new Bitmap(@"C:\Users\jxw\Desktop\png\1.png");
bitmap 的值是正常的



**Code**

 SKCodec codec = SKCodec.Create(@"C:\Users\jxw\Desktop\png\1.png");
 SKBitmap sKBitmap = SKBitmap.Decode(codec);




Bitmap bitmap = new Bitmap(@"C:\Users\jxw\Desktop\png\1.png");
            

**Expected Behavior**

<!-- a general description of what was the expected behavior or result -->

**Actual Behavior**

<!-- a general description of what really happened -->

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue: SkiaSharp  1.68.3
- Last known good version:  <!-- the version of SkiaSharp that still working -->
- IDE:  Visual Studio
- Platform Target Frameworks: Windows  10
  



**Screenshots**

<!-- if the issue is a visual issue, please include screenshots showing the problem if possible -->

**Reproduction Link**

 
[1.zip](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/files/4867606/1.zip)
